trans-unit.source: Specifies the 3-D rotation to be used in a transformation.
trans-unit.target: Angir 3D-rotasjon som skal brukes i en transformering.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Singleton identity <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Singleton identitet <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The identity <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Identiteten <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Formaterer verdien for gjeldende forekomst med angitt format.

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: Formatet til å bruke.

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: - eller - en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic) til å bruke standardformatet definert for typen for den <xref:System.IFormattable>implementeringen.</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: Leverandør som skal brukes til å formatere verdien.

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: - eller - en nullreferanse (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> i Visual Basic) til å hente tallformat informasjonen i gjeldende ID for nasjonal innstilling av operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den gjeldende forekomsten i det angitte formatet.

trans-unit.source: Returns a String that represents the current Object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer gjeldende objekt.

trans-unit.source: String that represents the current Object.
trans-unit.target: Streng som representerer gjeldende objekt.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> using a specified format that represents the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.String>med en angitt format som representerer gjeldende <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: Formaterer verdien for gjeldende forekomst med angitt format.

trans-unit.source: Text as a series of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som en rekke Unicode-tegn.
